root.message: The IMPUTATION field for indicator 8-5-2, translated into all languages

languages.language:
Treatment of missing values:

  • At country level:

Multivariate regression techniques are used to impute missing values at the country level. However, the imputed missing country values are only used to calculate the global and regional estimates; they are not used for international reporting on the SDG indicators by the ILO. For further information on the estimates, please refer to the the ILO modelled estimates methodological overview, available at https://www.ilo.org/ilostat-files/Documents/TEM.pdf.

  • At regional and global levels:
